word:
"ON DECEMBER 28, ELDER S. E. WIGHT [NEW PRESIDENT OF THE SOUTHERN UNION CONFERENCE] HELD A MEETING WITH THE CHURCH, AT WHICH THE QUESTION WAS QUITE FREELY DISCUSSED. ELDER WIGHT DEALT VERY CAREFULLY AND CAUTIOUSLY WITH THE CASE AND SPOKE OF BROTHER E'S 
                                                                           233
GOOD TRAITS AND QUALIFICATIONS, BUT LET THE CHURCH KNOW THAT NEITHER HE NOR I COULD FEEL FREE TO ORDAIN HIM BECAUSE OF THE ADVICE GIVEN BY THOSE WHO KNOW HIM.
